      objectMapper - Jackson Objectmapper to use
      openCDXDocumentValidator - Document validator service.
      openCDXAuditService - Audit service to record events
      openCDXCurrentUser - Service to get Current user.
      openCDXMedicalConditionsRepository - repository for reading and writing medical conditions data
      openCDXProfileRepository - repository for reading and writing profile data
      openCDXCommunicationService - communication service
